HOW CAN WE HELP

We can help you with everything from an oil change to an engine change.
We can handle any problem on any vehicle.

  • SERVICING

    Our garage is fully equipped to support all your servicing needs. Our work is always completed to the highest standards.

  • REMAPPING

    Remapping or ECU tuning is when settings on a vehicle's ‘engine control unit’ (ECU) are altered to improve the vehicle’s performance.

  • MOT RENEWAL

    Is the MOT on your vehicle due for renewal? Give us a shout now to get booked in and keep your car on the road.


  • AIR CON REFILL

    If your air conditioning stops working it could be resolved quickly and easily with an air-con gas refill.

  • CUSTOM EXHAUSTS

    All sorts of exhaust work carried out while you wait. Twin exits, Straight pipes, Full lines, Dummy boxes and more.

  • Tyres

    FREE tyre checks and great deals and most sizes kept in stock.
